definition: so extremely old as seeming to belong to an earlier period, a very old person
details:
adjective
- so extremely old as seeming to belong to an earlier period
= example: so extremely old as seeming to belong to an earlier period
= synonyms: archaic
- of or relating to the period before the biblical flood
= example: of or relating to the period before the biblical flood
= synonyms: antediluvial
noun
- a very old person
= synonyms: ancient
- any of the early patriarchs who lived prior to the Noachian deluge
= synonyms: antediluvian patriarch
